title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: When deleting an item from the second row of the coolbar, the entire second row is removed.
EB: When deleting an item from the second row of the coolbar, the second row should remain intact, and the remaining items should not be shifted or moved.
SR: Ensure that deleting an item from the second row of the coolbar does not corrupt the layout and that the remaining items stay in their respective positions.
